item.title: Perito Moreno Glacier Is Thinning Faster Than Expected, Study Shows
item.description: After holding steady for decades, the beloved Perito Moreno has thinned considerably since 2019, scientists said.

item.title: Here’s What France’s Largest Wildfire in Decades Looks Like
item.description: Prime Minister François Bayrou described the nearly 40,000-acre fire, which has killed one person, as a “catastrophe on an unprecedented scale.”
